title: Trade, 2020 Elections & NRA
itunes:title: Trade, 2020 Elections & NRA
description:
Kevin spoke with Briahna Joy Gray, Bernie Sanders Campaign National Press Secretary, Antjuan Seawright, Democratic Strategist and Former Senior Advisor to Hillary Clinton in SC, and Jeffrey Wright, Eurasia Group Analyst, and Dan Eberhart, CEO of Canary LLC. They discussed trade, the 2020 presidential elections and the NRA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
